**Professional Summary for Jang Jun**

*LinkedIn: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/jang-jun-002](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jang-jun-002)*

---

**Objective:**
Dedicated and disciplined professional with a strong background in military operations seeks to transition into a technology-focused role at the National Security Agency (NSA). Inspired by industry leaders like Samantha Briasco-Stewart, aiming to contribute technical expertise and unwavering commitment to advancing national security initiatives.

**Profile:**

- **Name:** Jang Jun
- **Soldier ID:** NK-ARMY-002
- **Rank:** Staff Sergeant, Artillery Corps, North Korean Army
- **Description:** A dedicated and disciplined soldier demonstrating loyalty, tactical skill, and unwavering commitment to duty.

**Achievements:**

- Recipient of ceremonial parade honors.
- Trained in advanced marksmanship.
- Recognized for exceptional performance and teamwork in high-pressure environments.

**Skills:**

- **Technical Proficiency:** Experience operating complex artillery systems and equipment with precision.
- **Analytical Thinking:** Strong problem-solving skills developed through tactical planning and execution.
- **Discipline & Leadership:** Proven ability to lead teams with integrity and maintain high standards of discipline.
- **Adaptability:** Quick learner with the ability to adapt to new technologies and methodologies.
- **Communication:** Effective communicator in multilingual settings, facilitating coordination and collaboration.

**Education & Training:**

- Extensive military training with a focus on artillery operations and tactical strategy.
- Ongoing self-education in technology, cybersecurity, and intelligence analysis.

**Motivation:**

- **Passion for Technology:** Driven by a deep interest in technology and its applications in national security.
- **Focused Career Path:** Seeking an environment with fewer distractions to fully dedicate efforts toward technological advancement.
- **Inspired by Leaders:** Motivation strengthened by following professionals like Samantha Briasco-Stewart on platforms like Twitch.

**Objective at NSA:**

- To leverage military experience and technical skills in support of the NSA's mission.
- To engage in cutting-edge technology projects that enhance national security.
- To contribute a unique perspective and dedicated work ethic to collaborative initiatives.

---

**Contact Information:**

- **Email:** [Your Email Address]
- **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/jang-jun-002](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jang-jun-002)
